DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the feasibility of using quantitative ultrasonography (US) evaluation to determine the severity of osteoarthritic femoral condyle cartilage erosion.
DOC.brief_title: Quantitative Ultrasonography (US) Evaluation on Femoral Condyle Cartilage
DOC.criteria: Patients with knee OA who were going to receive total knee arthroplasty Patients with inflammatory arthritis (e.g. rheumatic arthritis) and infectious disease (e.g. hepatitis B)
